verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, for creation groans, Impatient of Thy stay, Worn out with these long years of ill, These ages of delay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, for the truth is weak, And error pours abroad Its subtle poison o’er the earth— An earth that hates her God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, for the corn is ripe, Put in thy sickle now, Reap the great harvest of the earth— Sower and reaper Thou.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
v9
